title: “Government is committed to protect both war heroes and farmers who render national service’, says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The duty of the Government is to protect both war heroes who liberated the country from terrorism and participated in the humanitarian operation as well as the farmers who provide food to the nation. The country was liberated and the people are allowed to live…
